description: mounted on ivory paper with tan, brown and gold borders; standing portly man with small glowing halo, with PR foot resting on a ball and PL on a shield (?), holding a crucifix in his PR hand and a lily in his PL hand; chair, large book, cloth-covered table and sacks on floor behind man
medium: Gouache on laid paper, laid down on a mount
provenance: [Colnaghi, London, 1970; sold January, for Â£50, as Genoese School, 17th century, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1970-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Standing Saint
